title: Apple deal  tax change could spark corporate solar stampede

content: SAN FRANCISCO  Jan 5 California Governor Jerry Brown on Monday laid out an ambitious plan for 50 percent of the state's electricity to be generated by renewable resources over the next 15 years and to cut petroleum usage by drivers.
name: Duke Energy Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Calif. governor vows to boost renewable energy  cut petroleum use
